verses.verse: And Eliyahyahu <WH452> the Tishbite <WH8664>, who was of the inhabitants <WH8453> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Ach'av <WH256>, As the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> liveth <WH2416>, before <WH6440> whom I stand <WH5975> <WH8804>, there shall not be dew <WH2919> nor rain <WH4306> these years <WH8141>, but according <WH6310> to my word <WH1697>.
And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Get <WH3212> <WH8798> thee hence, and turn <WH6437> <WH8804> thee eastward <WH6924>, and hide <WH5641> <WH8738> thyself by the brook <WH5158> Cherith <WH3747>, that is before <WH6440> Yarden <WH3383>.
And it shall be, that thou shalt drink <WH8354> <WH8799> of the brook <WH5158>; and I have commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> the ravens <WH6158> to feed <WH3557> <WH8771> thee there.

So he went <WH3212> <WH8799> and did <WH6213> <WH8799> according unto the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>: for he went <WH3212> <WH8799> and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> by the brook <WH5158> Cherith <WH3747>, that is before <WH6440> Yarden <WH3383>.

And the ravens <WH6158> brought <WH935> <WH8688> him bread <WH3899> and flesh <WH1320> in the morning <WH1242>, and bread <WH3899> and flesh <WH1320> in the evening <WH6153>; and he drank <WH8354> <WH8799> of the brook <WH5158>.
And it came to pass after <WH7093> a while <WH3117>, that the brook <WH5158> dried up <WH3001> <WH8799>, because there had been no rain <WH1653> in the land <WH776>.
And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, get <WH3212> <WH8798> thee to TZarfat <WH6886>, which belongeth to Zidon <WH6721>, and dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> there: behold, I have commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> a widow <WH490> woman <WH802> there to sustain <WH3557> <WH8771> thee.

So he arose <WH6965> <WH8799> and went <WH3212> <WH8799> to TZarfat <WH6886>. And when he came <WH935> <WH8799> to the gate <WH6607> of the city <WH5892>, behold, the widow <WH490> woman <WH802> was there gathering <WH7197> <WH8781> of sticks <WH6086>: and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> to her, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Fetch <WH3947> <WH8798> me, I pray thee, a little <WH4592> water <WH4325> in a vessel <WH3627>, that I may drink <WH8354> <WH8799>.

And as she was going <WH3212> <WH8799> to fetch <WH3947> <WH8800> it, he called <WH7121> <WH8799> to her, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Bring <WH3947> <WH8798> me, I pray thee, a morsel <WH6595> of bread <WH3899> in thine hand <WH3027>.

And she said <WH559> <WH8799>, As the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> liveth <WH2416>, I have <WH3426> not a cake <WH4580>, but an handful <WH4393> <WH3709> of meal <WH7058> in a barrel <WH3537>, and a little <WH4592> oil <WH8081> in a cruse <WH6835>: and, behold, I am gathering <WH7197> <WH8781> two <WH8147> sticks <WH6086>, that I may go in <WH935> <WH8804> and dress <WH6213> <WH8804> it for me and my son <WH1121>, that we may eat <WH398> <WH8804> it, and die <WH4191> <WH8804>.

And Eliyahyahu <WH452> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not; go <WH935> <WH8798> and do <WH6213> <WH8798> as thou hast said <WH1697>: but make <WH6213> <WH8798> me thereof <WH8033> a little <WH6996> cake <WH5692> first <WH7223>, and bring <WH3318> <WH8689> it unto me, and after <WH314> make <WH6213> <WH8799> for thee and for thy son <WH1121>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, The barrel <WH3537> of meal <WH7058> shall not waste <WH3615> <WH8799>, neither shall the cruse <WH6835> of oil <WH8081> fail <WH2637> <WH8799>, until the day <WH3117> that the YY <WH3068> sendeth <WH5414> <WH8800> rain <WH1653> upon <WH6440> the earth <WH127>.
And she went <WH3212> <WH8799> and did <WH6213> <WH8799> according to the saying <WH1697> of Eliyahyahu <WH452>: and she, and he, and her house <WH1004>, did eat <WH398> <WH8799> many days <WH3117>.

And the barrel <WH3537> of meal <WH7058> wasted <WH3615> <WH8804> not, neither did the cruse <WH6835> of oil <WH8081> fail <WH2638>, according to the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>, which he spake <WH1696> <WH8765> by <WH3027> Eliyahyahu <WH452>.

And it came to pass after <WH310> these things <WH1697>, that the son <WH1121> of the woman <WH802>, the mistress <WH1172> of the house <WH1004>, fell sick <WH2470> <WH8804>; and his sickness <WH2483> was so <WH3966> sore <WH2389>, that there was no breath <WH5397> left <WH3498> <WH8738> in him.

And she said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Eliyahyahu <WH452>, What have I to do with thee, O thou man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>? art thou come <WH935> <WH8804> unto me to call <WH2142> my sin <WH5771> to remembrance <WH2142> <WH8687>, and to slay <WH4191> <WH8687> my son <WH1121> ?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Give <WH5414> <WH8798> me thy son <WH1121>. And he took <WH3947> <WH8799> him out of her bosom <WH2436>, and carried him up <WH5927> <WH8686> into a loft <WH5944>, where he abode <WH3427> <WH8802>, and laid <WH7901> <WH8686> him upon his own bed <WH4296>.

And he cried <WH7121> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, hast thou also brought evil <WH7489> <WH8689> upon the widow <WH490> with whom I sojourn <WH1481> <WH8711>, by slaying <WH4191> <WH8687> her son <WH1121> ?

And he stretched <WH4058> <WH8709> himself upon the child <WH3206> three <WH7969> times <WH6471>, and cried <WH7121> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, I pray thee, let this child's <WH3206> soul <WH5315> come <WH7725> into him <WH7130> again <WH7725> <WH8799>.

And the YY <WH3068> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the voice <WH6963> of Eliyahyahu <WH452>; and the soul <WH5315> of the child <WH3206> came <WH7725> into him <WH7130> again <WH7725> <WH8799>, and he revived <WH2421> <WH8799>.

And Eliyahyahu <WH452> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the child <WH3206>, and brought him down <WH3381> <WH8686> out of the chamber <WH5944> into the house <WH1004>, and delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> him unto his mother <WH517>: and Eliyahyahu <WH452> said <WH559> <WH8799>, See <WH7200> <WH8798>, thy son <WH1121> liveth <WH2416>.

And the woman <WH802> said <WH559> <WH8799> to Eliyahyahu <WH452>, Now by this <WH2088> I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that thou art a man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and that the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> in thy mouth <WH6310> is truth <WH571>.
